## MainWeb.DefaultFontName property

Gets or sets the control's default font name.

```csharp
public string DefaultFontName { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp
[C#]
	GridWeb1.DefaultFontName = "Arial";

[Visual Basic]
	GridWeb1.DefaultFontName = "Arial"
```
